short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MaskIt alerts you and masks sensitive data when pasted into AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MaskIt ensures your privacy by detecting and masking sensitive information when pasting it into AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, or Claude. Whether it's an email, phone number, API keys, or database connection strings, MaskIt helps you interact securely and confidently.


API Keys:
Copied: AWS_ACCESS_KEY=AKIAWJRUIZJTW2QKTVPI
Pasted: [AWS_ACCESS_KEY]

Database Connection String:
Copied: postgres://user:password@hostname:5432/dbname
Pasted: [DATABASE_CREDENTIALS]

Email Address:
Copied: helpdesk@example.com
Pasted: h***@example.com

Phone Number:
Copied: +1-123-456-7890
Pasted: [PHONE]

With MaskIt, you can securely paste information without compromising your privacy or exposing sensitive details.
